name: Saleblazers
storyline:
You wake up empty-handed in a bamboo forest and make camp in an old man's humble shop. Create successful businesses during the day and survive cultist attacks at night to uncover the island's secrets in an open world survival RPG for 1-8 players.

Defend your newfound customers from monsters lurking in the dark by wielding anything you can get your hands on - katanas, chairs, guitars, spellbooks, assault rifles, or frying pans.

Build a shop from scratch, tile by tile. Customers and employees will dynamically roam your shop for items of interest. Sell anything to the right customer at the right price. Hungry college students suffer from limited budgets and tourists are willing to buy just about anything.

Embark on a grand adventure that takes you to the Island's various villages across several biomes and world bosses.

Farm and fish to start your shopkeeping empire if you prefer a calmer gameplay experience.

Welcome unexpected guests to your server or take your entire lobby to visit other servers by enabling PvP invasions. Make small talk with proximity voice chat.
summary: Waking up empty-handed in a mysterious bamboo forest, you take shelter in an old man's humble shop. Survive nightly horrors while shopkeeping to fund a way back home in this open world survival game for 1-8 players.
